HIFIS-Surveyval

This project is used to develop analysis scripts for the HIFIS Software survey.

There are two scopes of developers within this project.

The first one is analysis script developer, which are using hifis-surveyval to analyse data sets. Please see the Getting Started guide.

The other one is hifis-surveyval developer, which are changing hifis-surveyval itself. Please see the Developer Guide.
